griffon.core

Interface ShutdownHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArtifactManager, GriffonAddon, JavaFXWindowManager, LanternaWindowManager, PivotWindowManager, SwingWindowManager, WindowManager<W>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractArtifactManager, AbstractGriffonAddon, AbstractWindowManager, DefaultArtifactManager, DefaultJavaFXWindowManager, DefaultLanternaWindowManager, DefaultPivotWindowManager, DefaultSwingWindowManager, GroovyAddon, NoopWindowManager, SwingAddon

    public interface ShutdownHandler
    A ShutdownHandler may prevent the application from exiting.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canShutdown(GriffonApplication application)
      Asks this handler if the application's shutdown sequence can proceed or not.
      void onShutdown(GriffonApplication application)
      Called when the shutdown sequence continues

    • Method Detail

      • canShutdown

        boolean canShutdown(@Nonnull
                  GriffonApplication application)
        Asks this handler if the application's shutdown sequence can proceed or not.

        Return false if the shutdown sequence must be aborted.

        Parameters:
        application - the current running application
        Returns:
        true if the shutdown sequence can proceed, false otherwise

      • onShutdown

        void onShutdown(@Nonnull
              GriffonApplication application)
        Called when the shutdown sequence continues
        Parameters:
        application - the current running application
